mapper.insert: insert into materiel (id, name, unit, model, specifications, remarks, note_taker, record_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update materiel set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, unit, model, specifications, remarks, note_taker, record_time from materiel
